title: parindu aruL puriya
sahitya:
parindu aruL puriya marandiDAn murugan varundit-tanniDam varum aDiyAriDam


anupallavi

  paranda pAr idil tan bhaktar ettanaiyO murai terindum teriyAdum purinda pizhai poruttu


caraNam    ten pazhanit-talam Onga daNDAyudam tAngi tannighar illAmal ninriDum nirmalan
vanna mayil vAhanan vaLLi magizh mOhanan punnakai polivurum SaNmukha sharavaNan
